page.title: 20MAJORETTES
page.content: We meet on Tuesday evening and Saturday morning.If there is a competition or a show it is usually on Saturday afternoon.There are two leaders for the group and they carry a mace which they spin and give us orders with. STAND AT EASE;mace to right,outstreached arm. TURN RIGHT;held aloft on right. TURN LEFT;held aloft on left. STAND TO ATTENTION;mace held in front of body. The ages vary from five to sixteen years, with the young children shaking their pom-poms while the older children twirl their battons. The uniform is kilts,blouses with lace on the sleeves and neck with a jacket and hat. We tend to use scottish music for our routines which last about twelve minutes.The group started in 1983.
